translations: n.耳垂；脑叶（lobe 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Longer ear lobes are their new fashion.
sentences.translation: 长耳垂是他们的新时尚。

sentences.sentence: Only women make their ear lobes longer.
sentences.translation: 只有女人会拉长她们的耳垂。

sentences.sentence: They think longer ear lobes look beautiful.
sentences.translation: 他们认为较长的耳垂看起来很美。
